import { useContext } from 'react' import { CartContext } from '../../context/CartContext' import './CartItem.css' const CartItem = ({id, name, price, quantity}) =>{ const {quitarItem} = useContext(CartContext) const quitar = (id)=>{ quitarItem(id) } return (

{name}

Cantidad: {quantity}

Precio Unidad: {price}

Total: {price*quantity}

) } export default CartItem
